# [FEAT] Help Center Categories and Sections

## Labels
`knowledge-base`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement a hierarchical structure for organizing help center content into categories and sections.

## Requirements

### Category Structure
- Top-level categories
- Nested sections within categories
- Unlimited nesting depth
- Category/section ordering
- Category descriptions

### Category Management
- CRUD operations for categories
- Drag-and-drop reordering
- Move articles between categories
- Bulk operations
- Category permissions

### Category Display
- Category icons/images
- Category color coding
- Featured categories
- Recently updated indicator
- Article count per category

### Navigation
- Breadcrumb navigation
- Category sidebar
- Category landing pages
- Quick navigation links
- Mobile-friendly navigation

### Multi-brand Support
- Brand-specific categories
- Shared categories across brands
- Category visibility per brand

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk Guide provides structured help centers with categories and sections for organizing content.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Hierarchical categories work
- [ ] Drag-and-drop ordering
- [ ] Category permissions functional
- [ ] Navigation elements present
- [ ] Multi-brand support available
